title: A Great Deal for Apple TV Shows
summary: This article talks about a special Black Friday deal for Apple TV, a streaming service where you can watch many TV shows and movies. Normally, it costs $12.99 per month, but for six months, you can get it for only $5.99 per month, which is half off. This deal is available in the US and UK until December 1, 2025. Apple TV has popular shows like 'Ted Lasso' and 'Severance', and you can watch it on devices like iPhones, smart TVs, and gaming consoles. The author thinks it's a fantastic offer to try out the service and enjoy lots of entertainment.
